name: instantly-cards-frontend
description: Frontend for Instantly Cards Channel Partner Application System

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp -r *.html css js images dist/ 2>/dev/null || (if not exist dist mkdir dist && xcopy /E /I /Y *.html dist\ && xcopy /E /I /Y css dist\css && xcopy /E /I /Y js dist\js && xcopy /E /I /Y images dist\images)

author: Your Name
